main event: On August 11, 1965, a UFO was observed in Prospect Heights, Illinois, described as a distant object with flashing red and white lights.
interesting points: The object appeared similar to the star Capella,Flashing lights in red, green, and white were reported,The sighting lasted for about two hours,The observers described the object moving in a straight line and not changing position,The conclusion from the investigation was that the object could not be identified.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a star
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Christiansen, who reported seeing the object at a significant distance with binoculars.
